data.title: Vale, Pacific Hydro Team Up On $315M Wind Farm Project
data.meta_description: Australian clean energy developer Pacific Hydro Pty. will build two wind farms totaling 650 million reais ($315 million) in Brazil to meet growing power demand from iron ore giant Vale SA, it said Monday.
